instruction: Rewrite this article to make the content more engaging.
input: Technology has drastically shifted the way we interact with the world. It has made it easier to do almost anything, from shopping online to entertainment streaming. Technology has even changed the workplace.
output: We're living in an age of amazing progress, as technology has transformed the way we engage with our surroundings. From shopping with a few clicks of a button to streaming entertainment on demand - the possibilities are endless! And technology has even revolutionized the workplace.
